// Structure: Array
#pragma once
#include <array>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdint>
#include <limits>
#include <string_view>

class ArrayStructure_String_2_prefix_suffix final {
    static constexpr std::array<std::u16string_view, 2> keys = {
        u"suf", u"pre"
    };

public:
    [[nodiscard]]
    static constexpr bool contains(const std::u16string_view key) noexcept {
         if (key.length() != 6u)
             return false;

        if (!(key.compare(key.length() - 3, 3, u"fix") == 0))
            return false;
        const auto trimmedKey = key.substr(0, key.length() - 3);

        for (size_t i = 0; i < 2; i++)
        {
            if (keys[i] == trimmedKey)
                return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    static constexpr size_t item_count = 2;
    static constexpr size_t min_key_length = 6;
    static constexpr size_t max_key_length = 6;
    static constexpr bool has_number = false;
    static constexpr bool has_uppercase = false;
    static constexpr bool has_lowercase = true;
    static constexpr bool has_symbol = false;
    static constexpr bool has_whitespace = false;
};
